content:
Hello all
i am new to Dataverde but have a query.
we have a application which build on power platforms and it use Dataverse for data storing.
now we need to import some table from dataverse to on-Prem SQL server using SSIS job.
I couldnâ€™t find any connector in SSIS job. Please Help if someone has done in past.
@Kapil hi! Are you talking about https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dataverse ? Or the Microsoft product?

Hi Phlip - I am talking about Microsoft Dataverse
We have used it in power apps application

@Philip Durbin Â I am talking about Microsoft Dataverse
We have used it in power apps application
Then we're sorry - we can't help you. We had the name first :wink: Sorry for the confusion!
Right, sorry, here we talk about the research data repository: https://dataverse.org
@Kapil which you are welcome to use as well, of course! It's free and open source. :grinning:
